QuestData.Title: The Missing Merchant
QuestData.Description:
Usually, Merchant Shi comes through Kun-Lai Summit to trade with the Jinyu and Grummle. We've heard word that he hadn't been seen at Binan, and we haven't seen him here...
I'm worried something has happened to him. Can you go to the Inkgill Mere and see if he's there?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Merchant Shi at Inkgill Mere in Kun-Lai Summit.
